artist: Painter: After Jacob Houbraken; Publisher: Jean Baptiste Descamps
description: bust length portrait of artist; turned right, looking at viewer; wearing long curly wig, white shirt open at the neck; in an oval, inside and architectural cartouche with paintings on either side
inscription:

below image in black: NICOLAS / VERKOLIE / ELEVE DE SON PERE / JAN VERKOLIE | on sheet in pencil: 2-542
title: Nicolas Verkolie
